title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about a ‘sledgehammer’ to innovation, longevity medicine, and more
description: Noubar Afeyan, one of biotech’s top investors, warned that a backlash against science in the U.S. could take “a sledgehammer” to biotech innovation
content: Noubar Afeyan, one of biotech’s top investors, warned that a backlash against science in the U.S. could take “a sledgehammer” to biotech innovation
